src:
Marcus/Kevin Melaju 1/4 Final Fuzhou China Open 2019
07 Nov 2019, 11:48 by Danang Sundoro



Marcus/Kevin Melaju 1/4 Final Fuzhou China Open 2019



Marcus/Kevin Melaju 1/4 Final Fuzhou China Open 2019


KBRN, Fuzhou : Ganda Putra Indonesia, Kevin Sanjaya Sukamuljo/Marcus Fernaldi melangkah ke perempat final Turnamen Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019 di stadion Haixia Olympic Sports Center, Kamis (7/11/2019) Siang.Inilah partai ulangan final tahun lalu, kembali tersaji di babak kedua Fuzhou China Open 2019. The Minnios, Kevin/Marcus tanpa gentar mampu menundukkan wakil tuan rumah rumah He Ji Ting/Tan Qiang dengan skor 16-21, 21-11, 21-16. “Di game pertama kami banyak mati sendiri, fokusnya belum dapet banget. Di game kedua dan ketiga untungnya kami bisa kembali lagi fokusnya. Kevin juga kontrol di bagian belakang lebih dapet,” kata Marcus usai pertandingan dalam keterangan tertulisnya kepada Radio Republik Indonesia (RRI), Kamis (7/11/2019).“He/Tan kurang lebih permainannya sama dengan pasangan Tiongkok yang lain, pertahanan mereka solid, serangan-serangan yang cepat dan keras. Di game kedua kami mencoba lebih siap dan kurangi kesalahan sendiri,” tambah Kevin.“Tadi nggak terpengaruh sih, kami kalau sudah di lapangan kan fokusnya ke pertandingan, jadi nggak begitu kedengaran suara penonton,” jawab Kevin ketika ditanya soal dukungan penonton kepada lawan mereka.Pada babak perempat final, Kevin/Marcus akan bertemu dengan wakil Jerman, Mark Lamsfuss/Marvin Seidel. Dalam empat pertemuan sebelumnya, Kevin/Marcus belum pernah sekali pun kalah dari Lamsfuss/Seidel. “Kami harus siap banget, tidak seperti pertandingan hari ini yang belum begitu siap. Fokusnya nggak dapet, mudah-mudahan besok lebih siap dari awal game,” ujar Marcus soal laga perempat final, Jumat (8/11/2019) besok. BACA JUGA : Fuzhou China Open 2019 : Sedih, Gregoria TerhentiGanda putra masih memiliki dua wakil yang akan bertanding di babak kedua yaitu pasangan rangking dua dunia, Hendra Setiawan/Mohammad Ahsan, serta Fajar Alfian/Muhammad Rian Ardianto.Hingga berita ini diturunkan, para pebulutangkis Indonesia masih berjuang pada pertandingan babak kedua Turnamen Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019. (Keterangan Foto : PP.PBSI)
text:
Marcus / Kevin Drove 1/4 Final of the Fuzhou China Open 2019
Nov 7 2019, 11:48 by Danang Sundoro



Marcus / Kevin Drove 1/4 Final of the Fuzhou China Open 2019



Marcus / Kevin Drove 1/4 Final of the Fuzhou China Open 2019


KBRN, Fuzhou: Indonesian Men's Doubles, Kevin Sanjaya Sukamuljo / Marcus Fernaldi stepped into the quarterfinals of the Fuzhou China Open 2019 Badminton Tournament at the Haixia Olympic Sports Center stadium on Thursday (11/07/2019) Afternoon. This was the final replay last year, again presented in the second round of the Fuzhou China Open 2019. The Minnios, Kevin / Marcus were undaunted to be able to beat home host He Ji Ting / Tan Qiang with a score of 16-21, 21-11, 21-16. "In the first game we died a lot by ourselves, the focus was not really able to get it. In the second and third games fortunately we were able to focus again. Kevin also gets more control in the back, "Marcus said after the match in his written statement to Radio Republik Indonesia (RRI), Thursday (11/07/2019)." He / Tan is more or less the same game with other Chinese couples, their defense solid, fast and hard attacks. In the second game we try to be better prepared and reduce our own mistakes, "added Kevin." It was not affected, we were already on the field, the focus was on the match, so the audience's voice was not so audible, "Kevin answered when asked about audience support for their opponents In the quarter-finals, Kevin / Marcus will meet with representatives of Germany, Mark Lamsfuss / Marvin Seidel. In the previous four meetings, Kevin / Marcus has never lost to Lamsfuss / Seidel. "We have to be very ready, not like today's matches that are not so ready. The focus cannot be, hopefully tomorrow is better prepared from the start of the game, "Marcus said about the quarterfinal match, Friday (11/08/2019) tomorrow. READ ALSO: Fuzhou China Open 2019: Sad, Gregoria Stopped Double son still has two representatives who will compete in the second round, namely the world number two pair Hendra Setiawan / Mohammad Ahsan, and Fajar Alfian / Muhammad Rian Ardianto. Until this news was revealed, the badminton players Indonesia is still struggling in the second round match of the Fuzhou China Open 2019 Badminton Tournament. (Photo Caption: PP.PBSI)
